data.name: PivotGridControlAppearance
data.value: Provides access to the properties that control the appearance of the Pivot Grid Control's elements.

data.name: PivotGridCellsSelection
data.value: Gets or sets the coordinates of the selected cells.

data.name: PivotGridCellsRowCount
data.value: Gets the number of rows in the XtraPivotGrid control.

data.name: PivotGridCellsMultiSelection
data.value: Gets the selected cells.

data.name: PivotGridCellsLeftTopCell
data.value: Gets or sets the coordinates of the left top visible cell.

data.name: PivotGridCellsFocusedCell
data.value: Gets or sets the coordinates of the focused cell.

data.name: PivotGridCellsColumnCount
data.value: Gets the number of columns in the XtraPivotGrid control.

data.name: PivotGridAppearancesSortByColumnIndicatorImage
data.value: Gets or sets a glyph that is used to indicate that values of column/row fields are sorted by a specific row/column.

data.name: PivotGridAppearancesSelectedCell
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the selected cells.

data.name: PivotGridAppearancesRowHeaderArea
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the row header area.

data.name: PivotGridAppearancesPrefilterPanel
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the panel displaying the Prefilter's criteria (when the PivotGridOptionsCustomization.AllowPrefilter option is enabled).

data.name: PivotGridAppearancesHeaderFilterButtonActive
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the filter buttons displayed within the field headers that are involved in filtering.

data.name: PivotGridAppearancesHeaderFilterButton
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint filter buttons.

data.name: PivotGridAppearancesHeaderArea
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the header area.

data.name: PivotGridAppearancesFocusedCell
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the currently focused cell.

data.name: PivotGridAppearancesFilterHeaderArea
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the filter header area.

data.name: PivotGridAppearancesExpandButton
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint expand buttons.

data.name: PivotGridAppearancesEmpty
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the Pivot Grid Control's empty area.

data.name: PivotGridAppearancesDataHeaderArea
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the data header area.

data.name: PivotGridAppearancesColumnHeaderArea
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the column header area.

data.name: PivotGridAppearancesBaseTotalCell
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint automatic total cells.

data.name: PivotGridAppearancesBaseLines
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the horizontal and vertical lines.

data.name: PivotGridAppearancesBaseIsLoading
data.value: For internal use.

data.name: PivotGridAppearancesBaseHeaderGroupLine
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint connector lines between field headers combined in a field group.

data.name: PivotGridAppearancesBaseGrandTotalCell
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint Grand Total cells.

data.name: PivotGridAppearancesBaseFilterSeparator
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the filter header area separator.

data.name: PivotGridAppearancesBaseFieldValueTotal
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the headers of Totals.

data.name: PivotGridAppearancesBaseFieldValueGrandTotal
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint grand total headers.

data.name: PivotGridAppearancesBaseFieldValue
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the values of fields and the default appearance settings used to paint grand totals and totals.

data.name: PivotGridAppearancesBaseFieldHeader
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint field headers.

data.name: PivotGridAppearancesBaseCustomTotalCell
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint custom total cells.

data.name: PivotGridAppearancesBaseCell
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint data cells.

data.name: PivotGridControlBorderStyle
data.value: Gets or sets the border style for the PivotGridControl.

data.name: PivotGridControlBeginRefresh
data.value: Occurs before the control's data recalculation starts.

data.name: PivotGridControlBeforeLoadLayout
data.value: Occurs before a layout is restored from storage (a stream, xml file or the system registry).

data.name: PivotGridControlAsyncOperationStarting
data.value: Occurs before an asynchronous operation is started.

data.name: PivotGridControlAsyncOperationCompleted
data.value: Occurs after an asynchronous operation has been completed.

data.name: PivotGridControlAppearancePrint
data.value: Provides access to the properties that specify the appearances of the Pivot Grid Control's elements when the Pivot Grid Control is printed.

data.name: PivotGridControlCellClick
data.value: Occurs when a cell is clicked.

data.name: PivotGridControlCellDoubleClick
data.value: Occurs when a cell is double-clicked.

data.name: PivotGridControlCellSelectionChanged
data.value: Occurs when the cell selection is modified.

data.name: PivotGridControlCustomAppearance
data.value: Allows the appearances of cells to be dynamically customized when the control is displayed on screen and in the print output.

data.name: PivotGridControlCustomCellDisplayText
data.value: Enables custom display text to be provided for the cells displayed within the Data Area.

data.name: PivotGridControlCustomCellEdit
data.value: Allows you to assign editors for particular cells.

data.name: PivotGridControlCustomCellEditForEditing
data.value: Allows you to assign a custom editor to a cell for in-place editing, and override the default cell editor, which is used in both display and edit modes, by default.

data.name: PivotGridControlCustomCellValue
data.value: Allows you to replace cell values with custom ones.

data.name: PivotGridControlCustomChartDataSourceData
data.value: Occurs when a PivotGridControl prepares data to be displayed in a ChartControl.

data.name: PivotGridControlCustomChartDataSourceRows
data.value: Allows you to customize pivot grid data before passing it to a chart control.

data.name: PivotGridControlCustomColumnWidth
data.value: Enables the column width to be customized.

data.name: PivotGridControlCustomDrawCell
data.value: Enables data cells to be painted manually.

data.name: PivotGridControlCustomDrawEmptyArea
data.value: Enables a Pivot Grid Control's background to be custom painted.

data.name: PivotGridControlCustomDrawFieldHeader
data.value: Enables field headers to be painted manually.

data.name: PivotGridControlCustomDrawFieldHeaderArea
data.value: Enables header areas to be painted manually.

data.name: PivotGridControlCustomDrawFieldValue
data.value: Enables column and row headers to be painted manually.

data.name: PivotGridControlCustomEditValue
data.value: Enables you to change cell values.

data.name: PivotGridControlCustomExportCell
data.value: Enables you to render different content for individual cells in a printed or exported document.

data.name: PivotGridControlCustomExportFieldValue
data.value: Enables you to render different content for individual field values in a printed or exported document.

data.name: PivotGridControlCustomExportHeader
data.value: Enables you to render different content for individual field headers in a printed or exported document.

data.name: PivotGridControlCustomFieldSort
data.value: Provides the capability to sort data using custom rules.

data.name: PivotGridControlCustomFieldValueCells
data.value: Allows you to customize field value cells.

data.name: PivotGridControlCustomFilterPopupItems
data.value: Allows you to customize the filter drop-down list items.

data.name: PivotGridControlCustomGroupInterval
data.value: Allows you to custom group values of column and row fields.

data.name: PivotGridControlCustomizationTreeNodeImages
data.value: Specifies the collection of images identifying nodes in the Customization Form used when the control is in OLAP mode.

data.name: PivotGridControlCustomRowHeight
data.value: Enables the rows height to be customized.

data.name: PivotGridControlCustomServerModeSort
data.value: In OLAP and server mode, provides the capability to sort data using custom rules.

data.name: PivotGridControlCustomSummary
data.value: Enables summary values to be calculated manually.

data.name: PivotGridControlCustomUnboundFieldData
data.value: Enables data to be provided for unbound fields.

data.name: PivotGridControlDataMember
data.value: Gets or sets the data source member which supplies data to the control.

data.name: PivotGridControlDataSource
data.value: Gets or sets the object used as the data source for the current control.

data.name: PivotGridControlDataSourceChanged
data.value: Fires when the Pivot Grid Control's data source changes.

data.name: PivotGridControlEditValueChanged
data.value: Fires after a cell value has been changed, allowing you to save changes.

data.name: PivotGridControlEndRefresh
data.value: Occurs after the control's data recalculation has been completed.

data.name: PivotGridControlEndUpdateMode
data.value: Gets or sets whether the PivotGrid will be immediately redrawn after calling the EndUpdate method.

data.name: PivotGridControlExportFinished
data.value: Occurs after the PivotGrid's export has been completed.

data.name: PivotGridControlExportStarted
data.value: Occurs after the PivotGrid's export has been started.

data.name: PivotGridControlFieldAreaChanged
data.value: Occurs after a field location or visibility has been changed.

data.name: PivotGridControlFieldAreaChanging
data.value: Enables you to control whether the dragged field header can be dropped at the area it's currently located over.

data.name: PivotGridControlFieldAreaIndexChanged
data.value: Occurs after a field has been moved.

data.name: PivotGridControlFieldExpandedInFieldGroupChanged
data.value: Fires when the expansion status of fields combined into a field group is changed.

data.name: PivotGridControlFieldFilterChanged
data.value: Occurs after the filter criteria have been changed for a specific field.

data.name: PivotGridControlFieldFilterChanging
data.value: Allows you to cancel changing the filter condition.

data.name: PivotGridControlFieldPropertyChanged
data.value: Occurs after a field's property has been changed.

data.name: PivotGridControlFields
data.value: Provides access to a Pivot Grid Control's field collection.

data.name: PivotGridControlFieldTooltipShowing
data.value: Occurs before a tooltip is invoked.

data.name: PivotGridControlFieldUnboundExpressionChanged
data.value: Fires after the PivotGridFieldBase.UnboundExpression property's value has been changed.

data.name: PivotGridControlFieldValueCollapsed
data.value: Fires after a field value has been collapsed.

data.name: PivotGridControlFieldValueCollapsing
data.value: Enables you to control whether field values can be collapsed.

data.name: PivotGridControlFieldValueDisplayText
data.value: Enables the display text of individual column and row headers and filter dropdown items to be customized.

data.name: PivotGridControlFieldValueExpanded
data.value: Fires after a field value has been expanded.

data.name: PivotGridControlFieldValueExpanding
data.value: Enables you to control whether field values can be expanded.

data.name: PivotGridControlFieldValueImageIndex
data.value: Enables images to be shown within column and row headers.

data.name: PivotGridControlFieldVisibleChanged
data.value: Occurs after a field has been shown or hidden.

data.name: PivotGridControlFieldWidthChanged
data.value: Provides a notification that the field's width has been changed.

data.name: PivotGridControlFocusedCellChanged
data.value: Fires in response to cell focus changing.

data.name: PivotGridControlFormatConditions
data.value: Gets the collection of style format conditions for a PivotGridControl.

data.name: PivotGridControlGridLayout
data.value: Fires after the control's layout has been changed.

data.name: PivotGridControlGroupFilterChanged
data.value: Occurs after a group filter condition has been changed.

data.name: PivotGridControlHeaderImages
data.value: Gets or sets the source of images available for display within field headers.

data.name: PivotGridControlHiddenEditor
data.value: Fires after an in-place editor has been closed.

data.name: PivotGridControlHideCustomizationForm
data.value: Fires before the Customization Form is closed.

data.name: PivotGridControlInvalidValueException
data.value: Enables you to provide a proper response to entering an invalid cell value.

data.name: PivotGridControlIsDragging
data.value: Indicates whether a field header is being dragged by a user.

data.name: PivotGridControlLayoutUpgrade
data.value: Occurs when a layout is restored from a data store (a stream, xml file or the system registry) and its version is different than that of the control's current layout version.

data.name: PivotGridControlLeftTopCellChanged
data.value: Occurs after the Pivot Grid Control is scrolled.

data.name: PivotGridControlLookAndFeel
data.value: Provides access to the settings that control the Pivot Grid Control's look and feel.

data.name: PivotGridControlMenuItemClick
data.value: Allows custom responses to be provided for clicks on context menu items.

data.name: PivotGridControlMenuManager
data.value: Gets or sets the menu manager which controls the look and feel of the context menus.

data.name: PivotGridControlOLAPConnectionString
data.value: Specifies a connection string to a cube in an MS Analysis Services database.

data.name: PivotGridControlOLAPDataProvider
data.value: Gets or sets which data provider should be used to bind to an OLAP cube.

data.name: PivotGridControlOLAPException
data.value: Raised when a query processing error occurs on a bound OLAP server, or when the connection to this server is lost.

data.name: PivotGridControlOLAPQueryTimeout
data.value: Fires after a specific interval of time has elapsed when sending a query to an OLAP server.

data.name: PivotGridControlOptionsBehavior
data.value: Provides access to the control's behavior options.

data.name: PivotGridControlOptionsChartDataSource
data.value: Provides access to the options controlling the display of the PivotGrid control's data in a chart control.

data.name: PivotGridControlOptionsCustomization
data.value: Provides access to the Pivot Grid Control's customization options.

data.name: PivotGridControlOptionsData
data.value: Provides access to the Pivot Grid Control's data specific options.

data.name: PivotGridControlOptionsDataField
data.value: Provides access to the options which control the presentation of the data fields in the PivotGrid.

data.name: PivotGridControlOptionsFilterPopup
data.value: Contains settings that specify the appearance and behavior of filter dropdown windows..

data.name: PivotGridControlOptionsHint
data.value: Provides access to the Pivot Grid Control's hint options.

data.name: PivotGridControlOptionsLayout
data.value: Provides options that control how the Pivot Grid Control layout is stored to/restored from a storage (a stream, XML file or system registry).

data.name: PivotGridControlOptionsMenu
data.value: Provides access to the Pivot Grid Control's menu options.

data.name: PivotGridControlOptionsOLAP
data.value: Provides access to the Pivot Grid Control's OLAP mode specific options.

data.name: PivotGridControlOptionsPrint
data.value: Provides access to the Pivot Grid Control's print options.

data.name: PivotGridControlOptionsSelection
data.value: Provides access to the Pivot Grid Control's selection options.

data.name: PivotGridControlOptionsView
data.value: Provides access to the Pivot Grid Control's display options.

data.name: PivotGridControlPopupMenuShowing
data.value: Allows you to customize context menus.

data.name: PivotGridControlPrefilter
data.value: Gets the Prefilter's settings.

data.name: PivotGridControlPrefilterCriteriaChanged
data.value: Fires when the Prefilter's criteria are changed.

data.name: PivotGridControlShowCustomizationForm
data.value: Fires immediately after the Customization Form has been invoked.

data.name: PivotGridControlShowingCustomizationForm
data.value: Occurs before the Customization Form is displayed.

data.name: PivotGridControlShowingEditor
data.value: Allows you to cancel editor activation.

data.name: PivotGridControlShownEditor
data.value: Fires after a cell editor has been invoked.

data.name: PivotGridControlToolTipController
data.value: Gets or sets the tooltip controller component that controls the appearance, position and the content of the hints displayed by the XtraPivotGrid control.

data.name: PivotGridControlUseDisabledStatePainter
data.value: Gets or sets whether the control is painted grayed out, when in the disabled state.

data.name: PivotGridControlValidatingEditor
data.value: Enables you to manually validate cell values.

data.name: PivotGridControlValueImages
data.value: Gets or sets the source of images that are available for display within field values.

data.name: PivotGridCustomTotalAppearance
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the custom total's cells.

data.name: PivotGridCustomTotalCollectionItem
data.value: Provides indexed access to the elements in the collection.

data.name: PivotGridFieldAppearance
data.value: Provides access to the appearance settings used to paint the field's header, values and value totals.

data.name: PivotGridFieldAppearancesCell
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint regular cells corresponding to the current data field.

data.name: PivotGridFieldAppearancesCellGrandTotal
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint grand total cells corresponding to the current data field.

data.name: PivotGridFieldAppearancesCellTotal
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint total cells corresponding to the current data field.

data.name: PivotGridFieldAppearancesHeader
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the field header.

data.name: PivotGridFieldAppearancesIsLoading
data.value: For internal use.

data.name: PivotGridFieldAppearancesValue
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the values of fields.

data.name: PivotGridFieldAppearancesValueGrandTotal
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the Grand Total headers.

data.name: PivotGridFieldAppearancesValueTotal
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the field's totals.

data.name: PivotGridFieldCollectionItem
data.value: Provides indexed access to individual fields in the collection.

data.name: PivotGridFieldCustomTotals
data.value: Gets the collection of custom totals for the current field.

data.name: PivotGridFieldDataType
data.value: Gets the field's data type.

data.name: PivotGridFieldFieldEdit
data.value: Gets or sets the editor used to edit cells corresponding to the current data field.

data.name: PivotGridFieldImageIndex
data.value: Gets or sets the index of the image which is displayed within the field's header.

data.name: PivotGridFieldOptions
data.value: Contains the field's options.

data.name: PivotGridFieldOptionsExAllowEdit
data.value: Gets or sets whether data editing is allowed for the current field.

data.name: PivotGridFieldOptionsExAllowHide
data.value: Gets or sets whether or not an end-user can hide the current field.

data.name: PivotGridFieldOptionsExIsFilterRadioMode
data.value: Gets or sets whether an end-user is allowed to select only a single item in the filter drop-down.

data.name: PivotGridFieldOptionsExReadOnly
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users can modify cell values.

data.name: PivotGridFieldOptionsExShowButtonMode
data.value: Gets or sets which cells corresponding to the current field display editor buttons.

data.name: PivotGridFieldOptionsExShowUnboundExpressionMenu
data.value: Gets or sets whether an end-user can open an Expression Editor for the current unbound field, using a context menu.

data.name: PivotGridFieldSummaryTypeChanged
data.value: Occurs after the field's summary type has been changed.

data.name: PivotGridFieldToolTips
data.value: Gets the field's hint settings.

data.name: PivotGridFormatConditionCollectionIsLoading
data.value: Indicates whether the Pivot Grid Control that owns the current collection is currently being initialized.

data.name: PivotGridFormatConditionCollectionItem
data.value: Gets a style format condition with the specified tag.

data.name: PivotGridFormatRuleMeasure
data.value: Gets or sets the data field to which the format rule is applied.

data.name: PivotGridMenuEventArgsBaseAllow
data.value: Gets or sets whether to allow the action.

data.name: PivotGridMenuEventArgsBaseArea
data.value: Gets the area of the field whose header or value has been right-clicked by a user to invoke the context menu.

data.name: PivotGridMenuEventArgsBaseField
data.value: Gets the field whose header has been right-clicked by an end-user.

data.name: PivotGridMenuEventArgsBaseMenu
data.value: Gets or sets the Pivot Grid Control's context menu.

data.name: PivotGridMenuEventArgsBaseMenuType
data.value: Gets the type of the invoked menu.

data.name: PivotGridMenuEventArgsBasePoint
data.value: Gets or sets the location at which the context menu has been invoked.

data.name: PivotGridMenuItemClickEventArgsBaseItem
data.value: Gets the menu item that has been clicked.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsBehaviorApplyBestFitOnFieldDragging
data.value: Gets or sets whether the Best-Fit feature is automatically applied to a field after it has been dragged and dropped at another location.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsBehaviorEditorShowMode
data.value: Gets or sets how in-place editors are activated.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsBehaviorHorizontalScrolling
data.value: Gets or sets a value which specifies the Pivot Grid Control's behavior when it is scrolled horizontally.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsBehaviorRepaintGridOnFocusedCellChanged
data.value: Gets or sets whether the grid control is repainted when focus is moved from one cell to another.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsCustomizationExAllowEdit
data.value: Gets or sets whether data editing is enabled.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsCustomizationExAllowResizing
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users are allowed to resize the Pivot Grid Control's elements.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsFilterPopupAllowContextMenu
data.value: Gets or sets whether right-clicking a filter popup window invokes a context menu.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsFilterPopupAllowFilterTypeChanging
data.value: Gets or sets whether the filter's type can be changed at runtime, via a combobox displayed at the top of the filter dropdown window.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsFilterPopupAllowIncrementalSearch
data.value: Gets or sets whether the incremental searching feature is enabled, allowing an end-user to locate an item in the dropdown by typing the item's initial characters.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsFilterPopupAllowMultiSelect
data.value: Gets or sets whether multiple item selection is enabled.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsFilterPopupIsRadioMode
data.value: Gets or sets whether an end-user is allowed to select only a single item in the filter drop-down.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsHintShowCellHints
data.value: Gets or sets whether hints are displayed for cells with truncated content.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsHintShowHeaderHints
data.value: Gets or sets whether hints are displayed for field headers that have truncated captions.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsHintShowValueHints
data.value: Gets or sets whether hints are displayed for field values with truncated content.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsMenuEnableFieldValueMenu
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users can invoke the field value context menu.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsMenuEnableFormatRulesMenu
data.value: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the PivotGridControl.FormatRules context menu is allowed and can be invoked by an end-user.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsMenuEnableHeaderAreaMenu
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users can invoke the header area context menu.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsMenuEnableHeaderMenu
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users can invoke the field header context menu.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsViewAllowGlyphSkinning
data.value: Gets or sets whether PivotGridControl icons should be painted according the control's foreground color.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsViewFilterSeparatorBarPadding
data.value: Gets or sets a value which specifies the distance from the separator line to the adjacent areas.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsViewHeaderFilterButtonShowMode
data.value: Gets or sets how filter buttons are rendered.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsViewShowButtonMode
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying when buttons of in-place editors are shown in cells.

data.name: PivotGridStyleFormatConditionApplyToCell
data.value: Gets or sets whether the appearance settings can be applied to data cells.

data.name: PivotGridStyleFormatConditionApplyToCustomTotalCell
data.value: Gets or sets whether the appearance settings are applied to custom total cells.

data.name: PivotGridStyleFormatConditionApplyToGrandTotalCell
data.value: Gets or sets whether the appearance settings are applied to grand total cells.

data.name: PivotGridStyleFormatConditionApplyToTotalCell
data.value: Gets or sets whether the appearance settings are applied to automatic total cells.

data.name: PivotGridStyleFormatConditionField
data.value: Gets or sets the field which identifies the columns whose values are used in conditional formatting.

data.name: PivotGridStyleFormatConditionPivotGrid
data.value: Gets the PivotGrid control which owns the current style format condition.

data.name: PopupMenuShowingEventArgsField
data.value: Gets the field whose header or value has been right-clicked by an end-user.

data.name: PopupMenuShowingEventArgsHitInfo
data.value: Gets info about the point where the context menu should be invoked.

data.name: PrefilterCriteria
data.value: Gets or sets the Prefilter's expression.

data.name: PrefilterIsPrefilterFormShowing
data.value: Gets a value indicating whether the Prefilter editor is currently displayed.

data.name: PrefilterShowOperandTypeIcon
data.value: Gets or sets whether the operand's value can be swapped.
